description: Hector Duff, who was awarded a BEM in 2013, says he never expected to get "any more".
title: New Year Honours: Centenarian Desert Rat 'surprised' by OBE
title_page: New Year Honours: Centenarian Desert Rat 'surprised' by OBE - BBC News
maintext: He said Mr Duff was "simply inspirational, not only in the way that he has given a whole lifetime of service, but in terms of how he continues to do all that he can to make young people aware of the horrors of war".
